original_text:
Helena
Quello delle antiche civiltà del passato è un tema di certo non nuovo nel mondo delle slot machine, ma che pur non rappresentando niente di originale continua a esercitare un certo fascino su nuovi e vecchi giocatori. La cultura ellenica con i suoi miti, le sue leggende e le sue divinità, è un tema vastissimo e che offre la possibilità di scegliere tra gli innumerevoli protagonisti della sua storia.
Questa slot machine prodotta dalla software house Novomatic è incentrata sulla figura della bella Elena di Troia, conosciuta anche come Elena di Sparta, figlia di Zeus in persona e famosa per la sua bellezza che fece cadere ai suoi piedi alcuni tra i più valorosi combattenti, scatenando addirittura delle guerre tra i pretendenti.
Elena era ovviamente una donna molto facoltosa, che amava circondarsi di ricchezze e di godere della gloria derivante dalla sua posizione; questi concetti di bellezza e ricchezza si rispecchiano sui rulli dell’Helena  di casa Novomatic, che propone una slot dal punto di vista grafico molto bella e ricercata, a partire dalla schermata iniziale che mostra la nostra protagonista stagliarsi in tutto il suo splendore sullo sfondo di un tramonto arancione che mette in luce anche un caratteristico tempio.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
Helena è una slot con una griglia di gioco strutturata in maniera tradizionale, con cinque rulli, tre righe e dieci linee di pagamento, e con i tasti per il settaggio posti sulla parte inferiore della schermata che includono anche l’opzione Autoplay, grazie alla quale si può giocare in maniera automatica impostando un numero predefinito di giri.
Su Helena si possono effettuare le proprie scommesse a partire da solo dieci centesimi fino a un massimo di 100 €, range questo che mette d’accordo tutti, sia i “giocatori di penny” sia gli high rollers. Il premio massimo che si può ottenere grazie a questa slot è pari a 40.000 monete, niente male!
La volatilità di Helena è media mentre il ritorno teorico al giocatore (return to player o RTP) si attesta su un decisamente poco entusiasmante 95,12%, di quasi un punto al di sotto della media.
Simboli e funzionalità di Helena
Tra i simboli che troviamo sui rulli di Helena ci sono in primo luogo le classiche carte da gioco, in questo caso solo dal 10 all’Asso. Per ottenere delle buone vincite però, bisogna aspettare i simboli tematici, che comprendono un vaso di terracotta, Paride di Troia e l’eroe Achille, detto il Pelide. Sia Achille che Paride sono simboli ad alto valore, che pagano 3.000 volte la puntata quando compaiono su tutti i cinque rulli.
Il simbolo Wild del gioco non poteva non essere la bella Elena che, oltre ad avere una funzione di jolly, può determinare da sola delle combinazioni vincenti che pagano fino a 40.000 monete quando è su tutti i rulli. Il simbolo Scatter è invece rappresentato da un’alba e se compare per almeno tre volte assegna 15 giri gratuiti.

raw_translation.response:
Helena

The theme of ancient civilizations is certainly not a new one in the world of slot machines, but despite not being original, it still exerts a certain charm on new and old players alike. The Hellenic culture with its myths, legends, and deities is a vast topic that offers the possibility to choose from the countless protagonists of its history.

This slot machine produced by Novomatic is centered around the figure of the beautiful Helen of Troy, also known as Helen of Sparta, daughter of Zeus himself and famous for her beauty that made some of the bravest fighters fall at her feet, even unleashing wars between suitors.

Helen was obviously a very wealthy woman who loved to surround herself with riches and to enjoy the glory deriving from her position. These concepts of beauty and wealth are reflected on the reels of Helena by Novomatic, which offers a visually stunning and refined slot, starting from the initial screen that shows our protagonist standing out in all her splendor against the backdrop of an orange sunset that highlights a characteristic temple.

Main features of the slot machine

Helena is a slot with a game grid structured in a traditional way, with five reels, three rows, and ten paylines, and with the buttons for setting placed at the bottom of the screen, which also include the Autoplay option, thanks to which you can play automatically by setting a predefined number of spins.

On Helena, you can place your bets starting from just ten cents up to a maximum of 100 €, a range that caters to everyone, both penny players and high rollers. The maximum prize that can be obtained thanks to this slot is equal to 40,000 coins, not bad!

The volatility of Helena is medium while the theoretical return to player (RTP) stands at a decidedly unenthusiastic 95.12%, almost one point below the average.

Symbols and functionalities of Helena

Among the symbols that can be found on Helena's reels, there are firstly the classic playing cards, in this case only from 10 to Ace. However, to obtain good winnings, you must wait for the thematic symbols, which include a terracotta vase, Paris of Troy, and the hero Achilles, known as the Pelide. Both Achilles and Paris are high-value symbols, paying 3,000 times the bet when they appear on all five reels.

The Wild symbol of the game could not be other than the beautiful Helena who, in addition to having a wildcard function, can alone determine winning combinations that pay up to 40,000 coins when it appears on all reels. The Scatter symbol is instead represented by a dawn, and if it appears at least three times, it awards 15 free spins.

message.content:
Helena

The theme of ancient civilizations is certainly not a new one in the world of slot machines, but despite not being original, it still exerts a certain charm on new and old players alike. The Hellenic culture with its myths, legends, and deities is a vast topic that offers the possibility to choose from the countless protagonists of its history.

This slot machine produced by Novomatic is centered around the figure of the beautiful Helen of Troy, also known as Helen of Sparta, daughter of Zeus himself and famous for her beauty that made some of the bravest fighters fall at her feet, even unleashing wars between suitors.

Helen was obviously a very wealthy woman who loved to surround herself with riches and to enjoy the glory deriving from her position. These concepts of beauty and wealth are reflected on the reels of Helena by Novomatic, which offers a visually stunning and refined slot, starting from the initial screen that shows our protagonist standing out in all her splendor against the backdrop of an orange sunset that highlights a characteristic temple.

Main features of the slot machine

Helena is a slot with a game grid structured in a traditional way, with five reels, three rows, and ten paylines, and with the buttons for setting placed at the bottom of the screen, which also include the Autoplay option, thanks to which you can play automatically by setting a predefined number of spins.

On Helena, you can place your bets starting from just ten cents up to a maximum of 100 €, a range that caters to everyone, both penny players and high rollers. The maximum prize that can be obtained thanks to this slot is equal to 40,000 coins, not bad!

The volatility of Helena is medium while the theoretical return to player (RTP) stands at a decidedly unenthusiastic 95.12%, almost one point below the average.

Symbols and functionalities of Helena

Among the symbols that can be found on Helena's reels, there are firstly the classic playing cards, in this case only from 10 to Ace. However, to obtain good winnings, you must wait for the thematic symbols, which include a terracotta vase, Paris of Troy, and the hero Achilles, known as the Pelide. Both Achilles and Paris are high-value symbols, paying 3,000 times the bet when they appear on all five reels.

The Wild symbol of the game could not be other than the beautiful Helena who, in addition to having a wildcard function, can alone determine winning combinations that pay up to 40,000 coins when it appears on all reels. The Scatter symbol is instead represented by a dawn, and if it appears at least three times, it awards 15 free spins.

This slot game, produced by Novomatic, revolves around the figure of the beautiful Helen of Troy, also known as Helen of Sparta. Daughter of Zeus himself, she was renowned for her beauty that drove some of the most valiant fighters to compete for her hand, even sparking wars among the suitors.

Helen was a wealthy woman who enjoyed the glory derived from her position and the riches surrounding her. These concepts of beauty and wealth reflect the aesthetics of the Helena slot game by Novomatic, which features a visually stunning and refined game screen. Main features of the slot game

Bets on the Helena slot game can start from as low as ten cents up to a maximum of 100 €, a range suitable for both penny players and high rollers. The maximum prize attainable through this slot game reaches 40,000 coins, not bad at all!

The volatility of Helena is medium, while the theoretical return to player (RTP) stands at a less than exciting 95.12%, almost one point below the average.

Symbols and features of Helena

However, to achieve good winnings, you need to wait for the thematic symbols, which include a clay vase, Paris of Troy, and the hero Achilles, also known as the Pelides. message.content:
Helena
The theme of ancient past civilizations is not a novelty in the world of slot machines, but it still manages to fascinate both new and experienced players. The Hellenic culture, with its myths, legends, and divinities, offers a vast array of characters to choose from and explore. This slot game, produced by Novomatic, revolves around the figure of the beautiful Helen of Troy, also known as Helen of Sparta. Daughter of Zeus himself, she was renowned for her beauty that drove some of the most valiant fighters to compete for her hand, even sparking wars among the suitors.

Helen was a wealthy woman who enjoyed the glory derived from her position and the riches surrounding her. These concepts of beauty and wealth reflect the aesthetics of the Helena slot game by Novomatic, which features a visually stunning and refined game screen. The initial screen displays our protagonist highlighting her beauty against an orange sunset that also illuminates a characteristic temple.

Main features of the slot game
Helena is a slot with a traditional game setting, structured with five reels, three rows, and ten paylines. The setting buttons are located at the bottom of the screen, including an Autoplay option that allows you to play in automatic mode by setting a predetermined number of spins.

Bets on the Helena slot game can start from as low as ten cents up to a maximum of 100 €, a range suitable for both penny players and high rollers. The maximum prize attainable through this slot game reaches 40,000 coins, not bad at all!

The volatility of Helena is medium, while the theoretical return to player (RTP) stands at a less than exciting 95.12%, almost one point below the average.

Symbols and features of Helena
Among the symbols found on the reels of Helena are, first of all, the classic playing cards, limited to the values from ten to Ace. However, to achieve good winnings, you need to wait for the thematic symbols, which include a clay vase, Paris of Troy, and the hero Achilles, also known as the Pelides. Both Achilles and Paris are high-value symbols, paying 3,000 times the wager when they appear on all five reels.

The Wild symbol of the game could not be other than the beautiful Helen herself, which, as well as functioning as a joker, can also determine winning combinations by herself, paying up to 40,000 coins when present on all five reels. The Scatter symbol, instead, is represented by a dawn, and if it appears at least three times, it awards 15 free spins.

Below is a review for the slot game "Helena".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Game structure
Symbols

Volatility and RTP
Free spins feature

- The review must be very detailed

Review: Helena

The theme of ancient civilizations is certainly not a new one in the world of slot machines, but despite not being original, it still exerts a certain charm on new and old players alike. The Hellenic culture with its myths, legends, and deities is a vast topic that offers the possibility to choose from the countless protagonists of its history.

This slot machine produced by Novomatic is centered around the figure of the beautiful Helen of Troy, also known as Helen of Sparta, daughter of Zeus himself and famous for her beauty that made some of the bravest fighters fall at her feet, even unleashing wars between suitors.

Helen was obviously a very wealthy woman who loved to surround herself with riches and to enjoy the glory deriving from her position. These concepts of beauty and wealth are reflected on the reels of Helena by Novomatic, which offers a visually stunning and refined slot, starting from the initial screen that shows our protagonist standing out in all her splendor against the backdrop of an orange sunset that highlights a characteristic temple.

Main features of the slot machine

Helena is a slot with a game grid structured in a traditional way, with five reels, three rows, and ten paylines, and with the buttons for setting placed at the bottom of the screen, which also include the Autoplay option, thanks to which you can play automatically by setting a predefined number of spins.

On Helena, you can place your bets starting from just ten cents up to a maximum of 100 €, a range that caters to everyone, both penny players and high rollers. The maximum prize that can be obtained thanks to this slot is equal to 40,000 coins, not bad!

The volatility of Helena is medium while the theoretical return to player (RTP) stands at a decidedly unenthusiastic 95.12%, almost one point below the average.

Symbols and functionalities of Helena

Among the symbols that can be found on Helena's reels, there are firstly the classic playing cards, in this case only from 10 to Ace. However, to obtain good winnings, you must wait for the thematic symbols, which include a terracotta vase, Paris of Troy, and the hero Achilles, known as the Pelide. Both Achilles and Paris are high-value symbols, paying 3,000 times the bet when they appear on all five reels.

The Wild symbol of the game could not be other than the beautiful Helena who, in addition to having a wildcard function, can alone determine winning combinations that pay up to 40,000 coins when it appears on all reels. The Scatter symbol is instead represented by a dawn, and if it appears at least three times, it awards 15 free spins.

response.headline: Gameplay and Features
response.content:
Ready for some excitement? Helena is a five-reel, three-row slot game with ten paylines that will have you on the edge of your seat! And for those of you who like to multitask (or just be lazy), there's an autoplay option to let the game spin for you. But don't worry, you can still place bets starting at a measly ten cents all the way up to a maximum bet of 100€.

But let's talk about the good stuff. The game features a Wild symbol that can help you win big by substituting for other symbols to create winning combinations. In fact, if you get a Wild symbol on all five reels, you're in for a whopping 40,000 coin payout! And let's not forget about the Scatter symbol - if you get at least three of them, you'll activate 15 free spins. Who needs to pay to spin when you can just get them for free, am I right?

Review: Helena

The theme of ancient civilizations is certainly not a new one in the world of slot machines, but despite not being original, it still exerts a certain charm on new and old players alike. The Hellenic culture with its myths, legends, and deities is a vast topic that offers the possibility to choose from the countless protagonists of its history.

This slot machine produced by Novomatic is centered around the figure of the beautiful Helen of Troy, also known as Helen of Sparta, daughter of Zeus himself and famous for her beauty that made some of the bravest fighters fall at her feet, even unleashing wars between suitors.

Helen was obviously a very wealthy woman who loved to surround herself with riches and to enjoy the glory deriving from her position. These concepts of beauty and wealth are reflected on the reels of Helena by Novomatic, which offers a visually stunning and refined slot, starting from the initial screen that shows our protagonist standing out in all her splendor against the backdrop of an orange sunset that highlights a characteristic temple.

Main features of the slot machine

Helena is a slot with a game grid structured in a traditional way, with five reels, three rows, and ten paylines, and with the buttons for setting placed at the bottom of the screen, which also include the Autoplay option, thanks to which you can play automatically by setting a predefined number of spins.

On Helena, you can place your bets starting from just ten cents up to a maximum of 100 €, a range that caters to everyone, both penny players and high rollers. The maximum prize that can be obtained thanks to this slot is equal to 40,000 coins, not bad!

The volatility of Helena is medium while the theoretical return to player (RTP) stands at a decidedly unenthusiastic 95.12%, almost one point below the average.

Symbols and functionalities of Helena

Among the symbols that can be found on Helena's reels, there are firstly the classic playing cards, in this case only from 10 to Ace. However, to obtain good winnings, you must wait for the thematic symbols, which include a terracotta vase, Paris of Troy, and the hero Achilles, known as the Pelide. Both Achilles and Paris are high-value symbols, paying 3,000 times the bet when they appear on all five reels.

The Wild symbol of the game could not be other than the beautiful Helena who, in addition to having a wildcard function, can alone determine winning combinations that pay up to 40,000 coins when it appears on all reels. The Scatter symbol is instead represented by a dawn, and if it appears at least three times, it awards 15 free spins.

The image should capture the essence of the Hellenic culture and may include elements such as temples, myths, and deities. The Maya warrior should be depicted in a comical or playful manner to match the lightheartedness of the game. Please ensure that the image is vibrant and eye-catching to attract players to the game.
